verses.verse: For <S%H113><s%>, behold, the Lord, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, doth take <S%H5493>away<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and from <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H4937>stay<s%> and <S%H4938>staff<s%>, the whole <S%H4937>stay<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4937>stay<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>;
the mighty <S%H1368>man<s%>, and the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>; the <S%H8199>judge<s%>, and the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and the <S%H7080>diviner<s%>, and the <S%H2205>elder<s%>;

the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%>, and the <S%H5375>honorable<s%> <S%H6440>man<s%>, and the <S%H3289>counsellor<s%>, and the <S%H2450>expert<s%> <S%H2791>artificer<s%>, and the <S%H2450>skilful<s%> <S%H3908>enchanter<s%>.
And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5288>children<s%> to be their <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and <S%H8586>babes<s%> shall rule over <S%H4910>them<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H5065>oppressed<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> by <S%H376>another<s%>, and every <S%H376>one<s%> by his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>: the <S%H5288>child<s%> shall behave himself <S%H7292>proudly<s%> against the <S%H2205>old<s%> <S%H7034>man<s%>, and the base against the <S%H3513>honorable<s%>.

When a <S%H376>man<s%> shall take <S%H8610>hold<s%> of his <S%H251>brother<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H8071>saying<s%>, Thou hast clothing, be thou our <S%H7101>ruler<s%>, and let this <S%H4384>ruin<s%> be under thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>;

in that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall he lift <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H559>voice<s%>, saying, I will not be a <S%H2280>healer<s%>; for in my <S%H1004>house<s%> is neither <S%H3899>bread<s%> nor <S%H8071>clothing<s%>: ye shall not <S%H7760>make<s%> me <S%H7101>ruler<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>.

For <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> is <S%H3782>ruined<s%>, and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%>; because their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> and their <S%H4611>doings<s%> are against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, to <S%H4784>provoke<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of his <S%H3519>glory<s%>.

The <S%H1971>show<s%> of their <S%H6440>countenance<s%> doth witness against <S%H6030>them<s%>; and they <S%H5046>declare<s%> their <S%H2403>sin<s%> as <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, they <S%H3582>hide<s%> it <S%H188>not<s%>. Woe unto their <S%H5315>soul<s%>! for they have <S%H1580>done<s%> evil unto <S%H7451>themselves<s%>.
Say <S%H559><s%> ye of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>, that it shall be <S%H2896>well<s%> with <S%H398>him<s%>; for they shall eat the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their <S%H4611>doings<s%>.
Woe <S%H188><s%> unto the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>! it shall be <S%H7451>ill<s%> with <S%H3027>him<s%>; for what his hands have <S%H1576>done<s%> shall be done unto <S%H6213>him<s%>.

As for my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H5953>children<s%> are their <S%H5065>oppressors<s%>, and <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H4910>rule<s%> over <S%H5971>them<s%>. O my people, they that <S%H833>lead<s%> thee cause thee to <S%H8582>err<s%>, and <S%H1104>destroy<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of thy <S%H734>paths<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> standeth <S%H5324>up<s%> to <S%H7378>contend<s%>, and <S%H5975>standeth<s%> to <S%H1777>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H4941>judgment<s%> with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H1197>thereof<s%>: It is ye that have eaten up the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>; the <S%H1500>spoil<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> is in your <S%H1004>houses<s%>:

what mean ye that ye <S%H1792>crush<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H1792><s%> and <S%H2912>grind<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%>? <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%>, <S%H136>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Moreover <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3282>Because<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> are <S%H1361>haughty<s%>, and <S%H3212>walk<s%> with <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H1627>necks<s%> and <S%H8265>wanton<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, <S%H3212>walking<s%> and <S%H2952>mincing<s%> as they <S%H3212>go<s%>, and making a <S%H5913>tinkling<s%> with their <S%H7272>feet<s%>;

therefore the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will smite with a <S%H5596>scab<s%> the crown of the <S%H6936>head<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will lay <S%H6168>bare<s%> their secret <S%H6596>parts<s%>.
In that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> will take <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H8597>beauty<s%> of their <S%H5914>anklets<s%>, and the <S%H7636>cauls<s%>, and the <S%H7720>crescents<s%>;
the <S%H5188>pendants<s%>, and the <S%H8285>bracelets<s%>, and the <S%H7479>mufflers<s%>;
the <S%H6287>headtires<s%>, and the <S%H6807>ankle<s%> <S%H7196>chains<s%>, and the sashes, and the <S%H5315>perfume-boxes<s%>, and the <S%H3908>amulets<s%>;
the <S%H2885>rings<s%>, and the <S%H639>nose<s%> - <S%H5141>jewels<s%>;
the festival <S%H4254>robes<s%>, and the <S%H4595>mantles<s%>, and the <S%H4304>shawls<s%>, and the <S%H2754>satchels<s%>;
the <S%H1549>hand-mirrors<s%>, and the fine <S%H5466>linen<s%>, and the <S%H6797>turbans<s%>, and the <S%H7289>veils<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H1314>pass<s%>, that instead of sweet spices there shall be <S%H4716>rottenness<s%>; and instead of a <S%H2290>girdle<s%>, a <S%H5364>rope<s%>; and instead of well <S%H4639>set<s%> <S%H4748>hair<s%>, <S%H7144>baldness<s%>; and instead of a <S%H6614>robe<s%>, a <S%H4228>girding<s%> of <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%>; <S%H3587>branding<s%> instead of <S%H3308>beauty<s%>.
Thy <S%H4962>men<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and thy <S%H1369>mighty<s%> in the <S%H4421>war<s%>.
And her <S%H6607>gates<s%> shall <S%H578>lament<s%> and <S%H56>mourn<s%>; and she shall be <S%H5352>desolate<s%> and <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon the <S%H776>ground<s%>.
